page.title: 15 ALTERNATIVE MALVERN
page.content: There are many groups in the Malvern area, working with limited funds and resources for the creation of a peace- ful and more just society.They have differing themes as can be seen: { { Parents Anonymous,}a confidential 'ear' for troubled parents. { Malvern Hills Fountain Group,}co- ordinates people to send thoughts of peace and harmony into the surrounding countryside. { Ahimsa,}a shop run by and for the community, offering good quality wholefoods at lowest possible prices. { Development Education Centre,}lends books,slides and other materials to teach about the Third World. Other busy groups are:{Amnesty Inter- {national, C.N.D., Oxfam Shop, Women {for Life on Earth, Friends of the {Earth, Rudolph Steiner Playgroup and a {Childbirth Information Group.}
